entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8.
